name: EnMesh For Home
description: EnGenius EnMesh is a new Home Wi-Fi system that is designed for the EnGenius Mesh Router. Users can enjoy whole house Wi-Fi coverage with a fast and stable Wi-Fi connection at home with a three pack of EnGenius Mesh Routers.  The EnMesh app helps you set up a mesh network and control your mesh devices from your smartphone. Keep your home Wi-Fi always running at full speed, full time. Everyone in your home can do stream, download, share and do all they love at the same time!   1. Supported model: EnGenius Smart Mesh Router series  2. Features: a. Easily set up the EnGenius new Wi-Fi System. b. Real-time Mesh Network speed test. c. Check Wi-Fi connection quality of for all Mesh devices. d. Create a separate network for your guests. e. Pause the Wi-Fi or set Rules on kids devices. f. Share Wi-Fi password to with your friends or family members. g. Easily to find your device by LED switch on app.
